Counter provides maximum value reported by internal event.

Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal DRB releases triggered by AMF for each 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB when completing one of the following NGAP procedures: - UE Context Release. - PDU Session Resource Modify. Release cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.
counter.description: Number of abnormal DRB releases triggered by AMF for each 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB when completing one of the following NGAP procedures: - UE Context Release. - PDU Session Resource Modify. Release cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal DRB releases triggered by AMF for each 5QI for each cell. counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal active DRB releases triggered by AMF for each mapped 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB when: - Completing one of the following NGAP procedures: - UE Context Release. - PDU Session Resource Modify. - DRB is considered to be in session at the time of release when the following options apply: - Bursty DRBs are considered to be released in session if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms. - Continuous DRBs are always considered to be released in session. - DRBs are assigned as continuous or bursty based on the configuration of the CUUP5qi.counterActiveMode attribute. - Release cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.
counter.description: Number of abnormal active DRB releases triggered by AMF for each mapped 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB when: - Completing one of the following NGAP procedures: - UE Context Release. - PDU Session Resource Modify. - DRB is considered to be in session at the time of release when the following options apply: - Bursty DRBs are considered to be released in session if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms. - Continuous DRBs are always considered to be released in session. - DRBs are assigned as continuous or bursty based on the configuration of the CUUP5qi.counterActiveMode attribute. - Release cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of inter-gNodeB PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB due to MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped when source NR cell sends X2AP SGNB CHANGE REQUIRED message to MeNodeB. Attempts that are aborted because of MeNodeB initiated handover procedure are excluded.
counter.description: Number of inter-gNodeB PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB due to MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when source NR cell sends X2AP SGNB CHANGE REQUIRED message to MeNodeB. Attempts that are aborted because of MeNodeB initiated handover procedure are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of intra-gNodeB PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB due to MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB MODIFICATION REQUIRED message with SCG Mobility cause. Attempts that are aborted because of MeNodeB initiated handover procedure are excluded.
counter.description: Number of intra-gNodeB PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB due to MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB MODIFICATION REQUIRED message with SCG Mobility cause. Attempts that are aborted because of MeNodeB initiated handover procedure are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of intra-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB because of MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB MODIFICATION REQUIRED message with SCG Mobility cause.
counter.description: Number of intra-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB because of MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB MODIFICATION REQUIRED message with SCG Mobility cause.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of inter-sgNodeB PSCell change resource allocation requests for EN-DC in target NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped when target NR cell receives X2AP SGNB ADDITION REQUEST message triggered by Secondary Node change.
counter.description: Number of inter-sgNodeB PSCell change resource allocation requests for EN-DC in target NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when target NR cell receives X2AP SGNB ADDITION REQUEST message triggered by Secondary Node change.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful inter-sgNodeB PSCell change resource allocations for EN-DC in target NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped when target NR cell sends X2AP SGNB ADDITION REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message for request triggered by Secondary Node change.
counter.description: Number of successful inter-sgNodeB PSCell change resource allocations for EN-DC in target NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when target NR cell sends X2AP SGNB ADDITION REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message for request triggered by Secondary Node change.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful inter-sgNodeB PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB CHANGE CONFIRM message from meNodeB. Does not depend on RRCReconfigurationComplete message received from UE.
counter.description: Number of successful inter-sgNodeB PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB CHANGE CONFIRM message from meNodeB. Does not depend on RRCReconfigurationComplete message received from UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful inter-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB CHANGE CONFIRM message from MeNodeB. Does not depend on RRCReconfigurationComplete message received from UE.
counter.description: Number of successful inter-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB CHANGE CONFIRM message from MeNodeB. Does not depend on RRCReconfigurationComplete message received from UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful intra-sgNodeB PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of SGNB MODIFICATION CONFIRM message from meNodeB indicating RRCReconfigurationComplete message from UE.
counter.description: Number of successful intra-sgNodeB PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of SGNB MODIFICATION CONFIRM message from meNodeB indicating RRCReconfigurationComplete message from UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful intra-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of SGNB MODIFICATION CONFIRM message from MeNodeB indicating RRCReconfigurationComplete message from UE.
counter.description: Number of successful intra-SgNodeB intra-frequency PSCell changes for EN-DC in source NR cell. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of SGNB MODIFICATION CONFIRM message from MeNodeB indicating RRCReconfigurationComplete message from UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of DRBs released abnormally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release triggered by MeNodeB. Trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal.
counter.description: Number of DRBs released abnormally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release triggered by MeNodeB.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal.
counter.categoryscenario: DRB Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of DRBs released abnormally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release triggered by SgNodeB. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message when following options apply: - Internal cause is considered abnormal. - Connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or gNodeB-DU is lost.
counter.description: Number of DRBs released abnormally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release triggered by SgNodeB.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message when following options apply: - Internal cause is considered abnormal. - Connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or gNodeB-DU is lost.
counter.categoryscenario: DRB Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of DRBs released normally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release. Trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB in one of the following cases when internal cause is considered normal: - At reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message. - At transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message.
counter.description: Number of DRBs released normally at EN-DC SCG radio resource release.
counter.trigger: Stepped for corresponding DRB in one of the following cases when internal cause is considered normal: - At reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message. - At transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message.
counter.categoryscenario: DRB Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases triggered by MeNodeB. Trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal.
counter.description: Number of abnormal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases triggered by MeNodeB.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal.
counter.categoryscenario: UE Context Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal releases of EN-DC SCG radio resources triggered by MeNodeB. UE is considered in session at the time of release. Trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal when UE is considered in session at the time of release. UEs are considered to be in session at the time of release if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms on MCG or SCG resources.
counter.description: Number of abnormal releases of EN-DC SCG radio resources triggered by MeNodeB. UE is considered in session at the time of release.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message with internal cause considered abnormal when UE is considered in session at the time of release. UEs are considered to be in session at the time of release if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms on MCG or SCG resources.
counter.categoryscenario: UE Context Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases triggered by SgNodeB. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message if internal cause is considered abnormal and when connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or gNodeB-DU is lost.
counter.description: Number of abnormal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases triggered by SgNodeB.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message if internal cause is considered abnormal and when connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or gNodeB-DU is lost.
counter.categoryscenario: UE Context Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of abnormal releases of SCG radio resources triggered by SgNodeB. UE is considered in session at time of release. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message when the following conditions apply: - Internal cause is considered abnormal. - UE is considered to be in session at time of release when connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or DU is lost. - UEs are considered to be in session at the time of release if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms on MCG or SCG resources.
counter.description: Number of abnormal releases of SCG radio resources triggered by SgNodeB. UE is considered in session at time of release.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message when the following conditions apply: - Internal cause is considered abnormal. - UE is considered to be in session at time of release when connection to eNodeB, gNodeB-CU-UP, or DU is lost. - UEs are considered to be in session at the time of release if any data (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms on MCG or SCG resources.
counter.categoryscenario: UE Context Release, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Number of normal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases. Trigger: Stepped in one of the following cases when internal cause is considered normal: - At reception of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST message. - At transmission of X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUIRED message.
counter.description: Number of normal EN-DC SCG radio resource releases.

X2AP SgNB Modification procedure for the purpose of SCG Addition ends with one of the following messages and result is OTHER: - X2AP SGNB MODFICATION REJECT. - X2AP SGNB RELEASE REQUEST.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of outgoing NR intra-frequency inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparation attempts in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at receiving RRC MeasurementReport message from UE indicating intra-frequency inter-gNodeB handover.
counter.description: Number of outgoing NR intra-frequency inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparation attempts in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at receiving RRC MeasurementReport message from UE indicating intra-frequency inter-gNodeB handover.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of outgoing NR inter-gNodeB Xn handover preparation attempts in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped when handover algorithm in gNodeB triggers an inter-gNodeB Xn handover.
counter.description: Number of outgoing NR inter-gNodeB Xn handover preparation attempts in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when handover algorithm in gNodeB triggers an inter-gNodeB Xn handover.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of NR intra-gNodeB handover preparation attempts in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped when handover algorithm in gNodeB triggers an intra-gNodeB handover. Based on reception of RRC MeasurementReport from UE.
counter.description: Number of NR intra-gNodeB handover preparation attempts in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when handover algorithm in gNodeB triggers an intra-gNodeB handover. Based on reception of RRC MeasurementReport from UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of NR intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover preparation attempts in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at receiving RRC MeasurementReport message from UE indicating intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover.
counter.description: Number of NR intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover preparation attempts in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at receiving RRC MeasurementReport message from UE indicating intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful outgoing inter-RAT handover preparations from NR to LTE in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP: HANDOVER COMMAND message.
counter.description: Number of successful outgoing inter-RAT handover preparations from NR to LTE in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP: HANDOVER COMMAND message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful outgoing inter-RAT handover to E-UTRAN preparation attempts in source NR cell because of poor coverage. Trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND message at poor coverage triggered handover to LTE.
counter.description: Number of successful outgoing inter-RAT handover to E-UTRAN preparation attempts in source NR cell because of poor coverage.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND message at poor coverage triggered handover to LTE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful outgoing NR inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparations in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND or XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.
counter.description: Number of successful outgoing NR inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparations in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND or XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful outgoing NR intra-frequency inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparations in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND or XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.
counter.description: Number of successful outgoing NR intra-frequency inter-gNodeB NG or Xn handover preparations in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of NGAP HANDOVER COMMAND or XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful outgoing NR inter-gNodeB Xn handover preparations in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at reception of XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.
counter.description: Number of successful outgoing NR inter-gNodeB Xn handover preparations in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of XnAP HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful NR intra-gNodeB handover preparations in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of RRC RRCReconfiguration message.
counter.description: Number of successful NR intra-gNodeB handover preparations in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of RRC RRCReconfiguration message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful NR intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover preparations in source NR cell. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of RRC RRCReconfiguration message.
counter.description: Number of successful NR intra-frequency intra-gNodeB handover preparations in source NR cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of RRC RRCReconfiguration message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of NG signaling connection establishment attempts. Trigger: Stepped at initiation of AMF selection. When AMF is selected, NGAP INITIAL UE message is sent.
counter.description: Number of NG signaling connection establishment attempts.
counter.trigger: Stepped at initiation of AMF selection. When AMF is selected, NGAP INITIAL UE message is sent.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempts to establish NG signaling connection for connections with RRC establishmentCause mo-Signalling. Attempt is triggered by receiving first message from AMF. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped at initiation of AMF selection. When AMF is selected, NGAP INITIAL UE message is sent.
counter.description: Number of attempts to establish NG signaling connection for connections with RRC establishmentCause mo-Signalling. Attempt is triggered by receiving first message from AMF. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped at initiation of AMF selection. When AMF is selected, NGAP INITIAL UE message is sent.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful NG signaling connection establishments. Trigger: Stepped at first message received on this UE associated logical NG signaling connection.
counter.description: Number of successful NG signaling connection establishments.
counter.trigger: Stepped at first message received on this UE associated logical NG signaling connection.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful NG signaling connection establishments for connections with RRC establishmentCause mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped when first message is received on this UE associated logical NG signaling connection.
counter.description: Number of successful NG signaling connection establishments for connections with RRC establishmentCause mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when first message is received on this UE associated logical NG signaling connection.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempts to release NR-DC with relocation of PDCP from Secondary Node to Master Node when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Release can be initiated by either Master Node or Secondary Node. Trigger: When initiated by transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message, the following options apply: - Stepped at transmission of E1AP BEARER CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message, before transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message. - Stepped at transmission of E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message, before transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message. When initiated by reception of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUIRED message, then stepped at reception of this message.
counter.description: Number of attempts to release NR-DC with relocation of PDCP from Secondary Node to Master Node when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Release can be initiated by either Master Node or Secondary Node.
counter.trigger: When initiated by transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message, the following options apply: - Stepped at transmission of E1AP BEARER CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message, before transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message. - Stepped at transmission of E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message, before transmission of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUEST message. When initiated by reception of XnAP S-NODE RELEASE REQUIRED message, then stepped at reception of this message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful attempts to release NR-DC with relocation of PDCP from Secondary Node to Master Node when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Release can be initiated by either Master Node or Secondary Node. Trigger: Stepped after completing all of the following procedures: - NGAP PDU SESSION RESOURCE MODIFY CONFIRM message is received. - F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message for reconfiguration complete indicator is received. - E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message is received after receiving XnAP SN STATUS TRANSFER message.
counter.description: Number of successful attempts to release NR-DC with relocation of PDCP from Secondary Node to Master Node when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Release can be initiated by either Master Node or Secondary Node.
counter.trigger: Stepped after completing all of the following procedures: - NGAP PDU SESSION RESOURCE MODIFY CONFIRM message is received. - F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message for reconfiguration complete indicator is received. - E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message is received after receiving XnAP SN STATUS TRANSFER message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of NR-DC UE setup attempts when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Trigger: Stepped at transmission of XnAP S-NODE ADDITION REQUEST message.
counter.description: Number of NR-DC UE setup attempts when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side.
counter.trigger: Stepped at transmission of XnAP S-NODE ADDITION REQUEST message.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful NR-DC UE setup attempts when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side. Trigger: Stepped after receiving one of the following messages: - E1AP BEARER CONTEXT RELEASE COMPLETE message if only SN terminated bearers exist. - Last E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message if one or more MN terminated bearers exist.
counter.description: Number of successful NR-DC UE setup attempts when intra-cell handover is used. Counted on Master Node side.
counter.trigger: Stepped after receiving one of the following messages: - E1AP BEARER CONTEXT RELEASE COMPLETE message if only SN terminated bearers exist. - Last E1AP BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message if one or more MN terminated bearers exist.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted PDU session establishments. Trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish a PDU session using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.
counter.description: Number of attempted PDU session establishments.
counter.trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish a PDU session using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted PDU session establishments. Trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish a PDU session using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.
counter.description: Number of attempted PDU session establishments.
counter.trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish a PDU session using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully established PDU sessions. Trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully set up using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.
counter.description: Number of successfully established PDU sessions.
counter.trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully set up using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully established PDU sessions. Trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully set up using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.
counter.description: Number of successfully established PDU sessions.
counter.trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully set up using NGAP procedures Initial Context Setup or PDU Session Resource Setup.

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of PDU Sessions for UEs in RRC Connected mode. Trigger: Based on periodic internal event with 5-second period time. Internal event maintains current number of PDU sessions. Updated at the end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by internal event.
counter.description: Peak number of PDU Sessions for UEs in RRC Connected mode.
counter.trigger: Based on periodic internal event with 5-second period time. Internal event maintains current number of PDU sessions. Updated at the end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by internal event.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times pmEbsPduSessionLevelSum accumulates new sample. Trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter accumulates new sample.
counter.description: Number of times pmEbsPduSessionLevelSum accumulates new sample.
counter.trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter accumulates new sample.

counter.documentation: Description: Sum of all sample values recorded for number of PDU Sessions for UEs in RRC Connected mode. Trigger: Based on periodic internal event with 5-second period time. Internal event maintains current number of PDU sessions. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
counter.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for number of PDU Sessions for UEs in RRC Connected mode.
counter.trigger: Based on periodic internal event with 5-second period time. Internal event maintains current number of PDU sessions. Values are read periodically and accumulated.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted PDU session modification. Trigger: Stepped when attempting to modify PDU session using NGAP procedure PDU Session Resource Modify.
counter.description: Number of attempted PDU session modification.
counter.trigger: Stepped when attempting to modify PDU session using NGAP procedure PDU Session Resource Modify.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully modified PDU sessions. Trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully modified using NGAP procedure PDU Session Resource Modify.
counter.description: Number of successfully modified PDU sessions.
counter.trigger: Stepped when PDU session is successfully modified using NGAP procedure PDU Session Resource Modify.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of PDU sessions released by AMF when cause is considered abnormal. Trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.
counter.description: Number of PDU sessions released by AMF when cause is considered abnormal.
counter.trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered abnormal and AMF initiates the release.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of PDU sessions released by gNodeB when cause is considered abnormal. Trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered abnormal and gNodeB initiates the release.
counter.description: Number of PDU sessions released by gNodeB when cause is considered abnormal.
counter.trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered abnormal and gNodeB initiates the release.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of PDU sessions released when cause is considered normal for each cell. Trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered normal.
counter.description: Number of PDU sessions released when cause is considered normal for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered normal.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of PDU sessions released when cause is considered normal for each cell. Trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered normal.
counter.description: Number of PDU sessions released when cause is considered normal for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped at completion of NGAP procedure UE Context Release when cause is considered normal.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of ROHC configuration attempts for each 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped when attempting to configure Robust Header Compression for a DRB.
counter.description: Number of ROHC configuration attempts for each 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when attempting to configure Robust Header Compression for a DRB.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because CID is not available in CU-UP for each 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because CID is not available in CU-UP.
counter.description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because CID is not available in CU-UP for each 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because CID is not available in CU-UP.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because ROHC profiles are not supported by UE for each 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because ROHC profiles are not supported by UE.
counter.description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because ROHC profiles are not supported by UE for each 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because ROHC profiles are not supported by UE.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because maximum number of ROHC context IDs supported by UE is reached for each 5QI for each cell. Trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because maximum number of ROHC context IDs supported by UE is reached.
counter.description: Number of ROHC configuration failures because maximum number of ROHC context IDs supported by UE is reached for each 5QI for each cell.
counter.trigger: Stepped when ROHC configuration for a DRB fails because maximum number of ROHC context IDs supported by UE is reached.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Establishment procedures. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Establishment procedures. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Establishment procedures with establishmentCause mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU with establishmentCause mo-Signalling.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Establishment procedures with establishmentCause mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU with establishmentCause mo-Signalling.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of RRC Setup Request procedures considered as reattempts. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU while RRC Connection Establishment is already ongoing with same UE identity.
counter.description: Number of RRC Setup Request procedures considered as reattempts. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU while RRC Connection Establishment is already ongoing with same UE identity.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of RRC Setup Request procedures with establishmentCause mo-Signalling that are considered as reattempts. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Trigger: Stepped when the following conditions apply: - RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU with establishmentCause mo-Signalling. - RRC Connection Establishment is already ongoing with same UE identity.
counter.description: Number of RRC Setup Request procedures with establishmentCause mo-Signalling that are considered as reattempts. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when the following conditions apply: - RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU with establishmentCause mo-Signalling. - RRC Connection Establishment is already ongoing with same UE identity.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of RRC Connection Establishment latency. Unit: ms Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..10] ms Bin[1]: [11..15] ms Bin[2]: [16..20] ms Bin[3]: [21..25] ms Bin[4]: [26..30] ms Bin[5]: [31..35] ms Bin[6]: [36..40] ms Bin[7]: [41..45] ms Bin[8]: [46..50] ms Bin[9]: [51..60] ms Bin[10]: [61..70] ms Bin[11]: [71..80] ms Bin[12]: [81..90] ms Bin[13]: [91..100] ms Bin[14]: [101..110] ms Bin[15]: [111..120] ms Bin[16]: [121..130] ms Bin[17]: [131..140] ms Bin[18]: [141..150] ms Bin[19]: [151..160] ms Bin[20]: [161..170] ms Bin[21]: [171..180] ms Bin[22]: [181..190] ms Bin[23]: [191..200] ms Bin[24]: [200..] ms Trigger: Stepped for each received RRCSetupComplete message. Latency is between RRCSetupRequest message received and RRCSetupComplete message received.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each received RRCSetupComplete message. Latency is between RRCSetupRequest message received and RRCSetupComplete message received.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Establishment procedures. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Establishment procedures. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Successful RRC Connection Establishment procedure where establishmentCause is mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU and establishmentCause is mo-Signalling.
counter.description: Successful RRC Connection Establishment procedure where establishmentCause is mo-Signalling. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU and establishmentCause is mo-Signalling.

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell. Trigger: Based on periodic event that maintains current number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR with 5-second period time. Updated at the end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.
counter.description: Peak number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell.
counter.trigger: Based on periodic event that maintains current number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR with 5-second period time. Updated at the end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.
counter.categoryscenario: RRC Connected Users, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. For NR-DC, NR SA UEs on Master Node side, configured with NR-DC are included. Trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Values are read every 5 seconds.
counter.description: Peak number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. For NR-DC, NR SA UEs on Master Node side, configured with NR-DC are included.
counter.trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Values are read every 5 seconds.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times corresponding pmEbsRrcConnLevelSumSa and pmEbsRrcConnLevelSumEnDc counters accumulate new sample. Trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counters accumulate new sample.
counter.description: Number of times corresponding pmEbsRrcConnLevelSumSa and pmEbsRrcConnLevelSumEnDc counters accumulate new sample.
counter.trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counters accumulate new sample.

counter.documentation: Description: Sum of all sample values recorded for NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell. Trigger: Based on periodic event that maintains current number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell with 5-second period time. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
counter.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell.
counter.trigger: Based on periodic event that maintains current number of NR EN-DC UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode in NR cell with 5-second period time. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
counter.categoryscenario: RRC Connected Users, E-UTRA and NR: Dual Connectivity

counter.documentation: Description: Sum of all samples taken to track the number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. For NR-DC, NR SA UEs on Master Node side, configured with NR-DC are included. Trigger: Number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode, sampled every 5 seconds and accumulated. Accumulated value is stored at the end of each ROP.
counter.description: Sum of all samples taken to track the number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. For NR-DC, NR SA UEs on Master Node side, configured with NR-DC are included.
counter.trigger: Number of NR SA UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode, sampled every 5 seconds and accumulated. Accumulated value is stored at the end of each ROP.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures without fallback. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Request. Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures without fallback. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures differentiated for each DRB without fallback. Trigger: Stepped when internal UE context retrieval or XnAP RETRIEVE UE CONTEXT RESPONSE message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures differentiated for each DRB without fallback.
counter.trigger: Stepped when internal UE context retrieval or XnAP RETRIEVE UE CONTEXT RESPONSE message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed first RRC Reconfiguration procedures after RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures differentiated for each DRB without fallback. Trigger: Stepped when first RRCReconfigurationComplete message after RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed first RRC Reconfiguration procedures after RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures differentiated for each DRB without fallback.
counter.trigger: Stepped when first RRCReconfigurationComplete message after RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures with fallback to RRC Connection Establishment. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Request. Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures with fallback to RRC Connection Establishment. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures with fallback to RRC Connection Establishment. 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete. Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures with fallback to RRC Connection Establishment. 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Complete.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures without fallback. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Complete. Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Reestablishment procedures without fallback. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Reestablishment Complete.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentComplete message is received in gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of RRC Connection Resume latency. Unit: ms Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..10] ms Bin[1]: [11..15] ms Bin[2]: [16..20] ms Bin[3]: [21..25] ms Bin[4]: [26..30] ms Bin[5]: [31..35] ms Bin[6]: [36..40] ms Bin[7]: [41..45] ms Bin[8]: [46..50] ms Bin[9]: [51..60] ms Bin[10]: [61..70] ms Bin[11]: [71..80] ms Bin[12]: [81..90] ms Bin[13]: [91..100] ms Bin[14]: [101..110] ms Bin[15]: [111..120] ms Bin[16]: [121..130] ms Bin[17]: [131..140] ms Bin[18]: [141..150] ms Bin[19]: [151..160] ms Bin[20]: [161..170] ms Bin[21]: [171..180] ms Bin[22]: [181..190] ms Bin[23]: [191..200] ms Bin[24]: [200..] ms Trigger: Stepped for each received RRCResumeComplete message. Latency is between RRCResumeRequest message received and RRCResumeComplete message received.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each received RRCResumeComplete message. Latency is between RRCResumeRequest message received and RRCResumeComplete message received.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures. Trigger: Stepped for each attempted RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures.
counter.description: Number of attempted RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each attempted RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures. Trigger: Stepped for each successful RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedure.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedures.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each successful RRC Connection Resume Fallback to RRC Connection Establishment procedure.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by EPS fallback. Trigger: Stepped at reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE RESPONSE, for which corresponding request is triggered by EPS fallback.
counter.description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by EPS fallback.
counter.trigger: Stepped at reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE RESPONSE, for which corresponding request is triggered by EPS fallback.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by critical coverage in NR during EPS fallback measurement. Trigger: Stepped at sending F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message when NR coverge is critical and UE is redirected to E-UTRAN. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.
counter.description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by critical coverage in NR during EPS fallback measurement. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.
counter.trigger: Stepped at sending F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message when NR coverge is critical and UE is redirected to E-UTRAN.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by EPS fallback measurement timeout. Trigger: Stepped when sending F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message because EPS fallback measurement is timed out and UE is redirected to E-UTRAN. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.
counter.description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by EPS fallback measurement timeout. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.
counter.trigger: Stepped when sending F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message because EPS fallback measurement is timed out and UE is redirected to E-UTRAN.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by unsupported cases of UE capability. Trigger: Stepped when sending F1AP UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message when UE capability is unsupported and UE is redirected to E-UTRAN. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.
counter.description: Number of UE Release with Redirection to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by unsupported cases of UE capability. Deprecated: Since 20.Q4. Planned to be removed.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful Release with Redirect to E-UTRAN procedures triggered by failure to set up UE Context in gNodeB-DU caused by unsuccessful UE capability check in gNodeB-DU. Trigger: Stepped when RRC RRCRelease message is sent.

counter.trigger: Stepped when RRC RRCRelease message is sent.
counter.categoryscenario: - UE Capability Failure - Release with Redirection

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated session time of released DRBs for each mapped 5QI in milliseconds. Trigger: Bin accumulates in-session time aggregated for DRBs with a certain 5QI. Bursty DRBs are considered to be in session if any data on any DRB (UL or DL) is transferred during the last 100 ms. Continuous DRBs are considered to be in session from the time of first data transfer (UL or DL) until 100 ms after the last data transfer. Session time of a DRB is only reported when DRB is released.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE context establishment attempts. Trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish UE context, using NGAP Initial Context Setup procedure.
counter.description: Number of UE context establishment attempts.
counter.trigger: Stepped when attempt is made to establish UE context, using NGAP Initial Context Setup procedure.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of Initial Context Establishment latency. Unit: ms Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..20] ms Bin[1]: [21..30] ms Bin[2]: [31..40] ms Bin[3]: [41..50] ms Bin[4]: [51..60] ms Bin[5]: [61..70] ms Bin[6]: [71..80] ms Bin[7]: [81..90] ms Bin[8]: [91..100] ms Bin[9]: [101..110] ms Bin[10]: [111..120] ms Bin[11]: [121..130] ms Bin[12]: [131..140] ms Bin[13]: [141..150] ms Bin[14]: [151..160] ms Bin[15]: [161..170] ms Bin[16]: [171..180] ms Bin[17]: [181..190] ms Bin[18]: [191..200] ms Bin[19]: [200..] ms Trigger: Stepped for each NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent. Latency is between NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message received and NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent. Latency is between NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message received and NGAP: INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful UE context establishments. Trigger: Stepped when UE context is successfully established using NGAP Initial Context Setup procedure.
counter.description: Number of successful UE context establishments.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE context is successfully established using NGAP Initial Context Setup procedure.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times frequencies are prioritized according to CA configuration due to traffic steering at UE release. Trigger: Stepped when frequencies are prioritized (in CellReselectionPriorities IE) according to CA configuration within message RrcRelease at UE release.
counter.description: Number of times frequencies are prioritized according to CA configuration due to traffic steering at UE release.
counter.trigger: Stepped when frequencies are prioritized (in CellReselectionPriorities IE) according to CA configuration within message RrcRelease at UE release.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of attempted Retrieve UE Context procedures triggered by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure. See 3GPP TS 38.423, Retrieve UE Context Request. Trigger: Stepped when XnAP RETRIEVE UE CONTEXT REQUEST message is received in source gNodeB.
counter.description: Number of attempted Retrieve UE Context procedures triggered by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure. See 3GPP TS 38.423, Retrieve UE Context Request.
counter.trigger: Stepped when XnAP RETRIEVE UE CONTEXT REQUEST message is received in source gNodeB.
counter.categoryscenario: RRC Connection Reestablishment, Retrieve UE Context

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully completed Retrieve UE Context procedures triggered by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure. See 3GPP TS 38.423, Retrieve UE Context Response. Trigger: Stepped when XnAP UE CONTEXT RELEASE message is received from target gNodeB after successful Retrieve UE Context procedure initiated by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure.
counter.description: Number of successfully completed Retrieve UE Context procedures triggered by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure. See 3GPP TS 38.423, Retrieve UE Context Response.
counter.trigger: Stepped when XnAP UE CONTEXT RELEASE message is received from target gNodeB after successful Retrieve UE Context procedure initiated by RRC Connection Reestablishment procedure.
counter.categoryscenario: RRC Connection Reestablishment, Retrieve UE Context

counter.documentation: Description: Number of inter-gNodeB PSCell change attempts for EN-DC in source NR cell that are not interrupted by MeNodeB due to MCG mobility. See 3GPP TS 37.340 for definition of PSCell. Trigger: Stepped when source NR cell sends X2AP SGNB CHANGE REQUIRED message to MeNodeB. Attempts that are aborted because of MeNodeB initiated handover procedure are excluded.
